description: This file defines a health check route for a Flask web application using the flask_smorest extension. It includes a Blueprint and a class-based view that responds to GET requests with a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask view class handling health check GET requests.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to return health status message.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
